text: ohu pilithuru nodi nihanda wiya.

lankawata gitaraya eema pilibandawa ewakata siti prabuddha sangithakarayin kamathi une na.batahira de prathikshepa kara indiyanu deta wandana karanda thamayi ee aya purudu wela hitiye.thawamath ehemayine..bandula padmakumara mahathmaya madhyakaruwek widihata gitaraya wenuwen peni hitiya.oya athare thamayi gitarayen lankawe sangithaye wiplawayak kala 'dharmarathna sahodarayo, munstons, supar goldan chayims, samanalayo, thri sistars, jipsis' ehema peramuna ganne.
